#### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada is soliciting bids for the reconstruction of Structure 401 located at McAuley’s Shore, Queens County, PEI. The project scope includes:

* Site work, including mobilization, demobilization, excavation, demolition, and removals
* Hauling and disposal of materials onsite or offsite, as required
* Supply and deployment of silt curtains, as per environmental permit requirements
* All work must be performed in accordance with the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.117982.002, included in the bid document

#### Bidder Requirements
Bidders must submit their supporting documentation and bid submissions by the tender closing date and time. Failure to do so will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The tender closing date has been amended to 2022-12-22T14:00:00 EST.
